articles.description: "As a Southeast Asian woman, being able to have our first Disney princess be inspired by my culture and my people? I feel like that's a huge move in the right direction," said Adele Lim, who also penned Crazy Rich Asians.
articles.title: Meet the Malaysian woman behind Raya And The Last Dragon - CNA
